descriptionHtml:
ABOUT:
======
This post is for our fans who know what we are about - Eye-Candy stuff.
A nice body. Lots of variants. A few skimpy outfits.
Everything will be based on \"OUR\" taste and ability and requirement. Thats it!
You want more? Something different? Have a suggestion? Want Armor? Want clothes? ... Please go and ask someone else.

==============================================
Update 06/02/2012: TB02_PH
I wanted my NPC\'s to use different body meshes and textures, with variant pubic hairs.
Since the body textures are hard coded (altering the properties meant losing tha auto skin-tint), and I wanted better resolution for the hairs, I\'ve added them as a mesh, with seperate textures (1024x1024). Undies shouldn\'t clip if you wear them on top of the hairs.
You can also use nifskope to copy the pubic hair mesh over to the TB02 body in the SilverX armor, if you want. Included a Brown variant texture as a example.
Added other objects to TB02 body, which need the silverX textures to work correctly.
You can delete these objects if you prefer.
You can also use the TB02 body for any NPC, and alter the hair texture paths to the brown version, or point to other custom textures you may make. See screenshot.

There will be no support for this mod.

ThorBody01
==========
Both the meshes are identical except the necks.
femalebody_0.nif = light
femalebody_1.nif = heavy

This will help prevent neck seams if you decide to use any of my other bodies as morphs with these bodies.

Thor Body Pack
=============
Hera x 4
Athena x 6
DMRA x 3
TB01 x 2

Note: Hera0 is not morphable

INSTALLATION:
=============
Add files to your Data folder

NOTES:
Hera, Athena, TB01, meshes are Interchangeable!
Replace the file femalebody_0.nif
OR rename the file to femalebody_1.nif and replace, to get different results.
Because the head neck seams are different, Some of the bodies if added incorrectly may show neck seams.

CREDITS:
========
Mesh imports - 2pac4eva4 - Thanks a lot!
New feet mesh - supplied by Phygit - Thanks a lot!

PERMISSIONS:
============
PM me if you want to use any of the assets.

====================================================================

TnT Members
============
2pac4eva7
motseer
Thor925

=====================================================================
author: TnT
